meanings.sent1: The wet towel is not dryable yet.
meanings.sent2: The laundry instructions say these clothes are dryable.
meanings.sent3: The sponge thought it was dryable, but it just made the spill worse.
meanings.sent4: Her humor was as dryable as a desert.
meanings.sent5: The paint on the wall was so dryable that it cracked easily.

meanings.sent1: The paint on the canvas is not dryable yet.
meanings.sent2: These fruits are dryable for preservation.
meanings.sent3: The joke was so dryable that everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His wit was as dryable as a bone in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The soil in the garden was so dryable that no plants could grow.

meanings.sent1: The fabric is not dryable in the machine.
meanings.sent2: This material is dryable on a low heat setting.
meanings.sent3: The situation was so dryable that it seemed like a comedy sketch.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as dryable as a desert wind.
meanings.sent5: The weather was so dryable that the ground cracked underfoot.
